full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR DGOS GRUB GTER MDZOD KYI YAN LAG DUS MIN 'CHI BA'I 'JIGS PA ZHI BA DANG TSE RGYAS PA'I DMIGS NANG ZAB MO BZHUGS SO, , *, ,DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED LA BRTEN PA'I BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR GYI SGO NAS GSHAN DON DU ZHI RGYAS KYI LAS SGRUB TSUL DGA' LDAN SNYAN BRGYUD KYI GDAMS PA THUN MONG MA YIN PA BZHUGS SO,, ,, *, ,BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR DGOS GRUB GTER MDZOD KYI YAN LAG DUS MIN 'CHI BA'I 'JIGS PA ZHI BA DANG TSE RGYAS PA'I DMIGS NANG ZAB MO NI, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @002A *, ,(CES 'JIGS BYED KYI BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR DNGOS GRUB GTER MDZOD CES BYA BA 'DI NI KU S'A LI ^DHARMA BADZRA GYIS RANG GI NYAMS LEN GYI CHED DANG, CHOS SDE CHEN PO DGONG LUNG BYAMS GLING GI RGYUD PA BLA MA'I ZHABS DRUNG 'JAM DBYANGS BSTAN 'DZIN GRAGS PAS BSKUL BA LTAR, BLA MA'I DAM PA'I MAN NGAG BZHIN TU BLANG BDE BAR CHOS SDE CHEN PO SKU 'BUM 'BYAMS PA GLING DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DGE SLONG BLO BZANG DAR MA'O, ,MANGGALAm, ,)
